price: 119. Kinnih immay Nabiyow ku Rabbi kah nacroore maray kaal yecmcncch kay farmoytit kataate Yallih inkittinaanel itta mawaa, woh kay fayxiiy kay mekla, usuk ken kah ginem meqe maraa kee uma maray sissini yakkeeninkeh iyyaanama, Nabiyow ku Rabbih qangaraa kee kay mekla gaba kalteh, diggah anu Jahannam gira jinnii kee sinaamak inkih kibeyyo iyyaanamal.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَۚ وَلِذَٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمۡۗ وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: illā man raḥima rabbuka walidhālika khalaqahum watammat kalimatu rabbika la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
